text: @BetteMidler Doesn't matter if he is lying or not, covid19 doesn't give a fuck, if he is lying we will know when he is hospitalized and on a respirator due to his advanced age and obvious bad health,  maybe it's a good thing that he refuses to meet with @SpeakerPelosi being she is 3rd in line
